summary: Technology is using ideas to create tools and machines for practical use. It includes physical items like tools and software programs. This has changed society over time. From ancient stone tools to controlling fire, which helped our brains develop, to modern inventions like the Internet, technology has made our lives different. It helps with communication and learning. However, it can also cause problems like pollution and job losses due to automation, leading to discussions about its use and impact on our world.
title: Technology
